data.title: Bright atmosphere and Delicious Food
data.text: Food on Buffet was varied, pleasant to look at, delicious and fresh.  Great Value and not expensive. Patiently, guided my spouse away from foods that he was allergic to.

data.title: New Chinese Restaurant and Chinese Buffet two in one.
data.text: In an area with no Chinese Buffet anymore I am glad this one opened up. The Restaurant was completely remodel. One side is a Buffet for $9.00 and the other side of the restaurant is an ordinary Chinese restaurant. The food is good and for only $9.00 a person this is very reasonable. My neighbors laughed about it, said you cannot expect much but I am very glad they are wrong. The prices are better than Sweet Tomatoes and I eat there a lot. Now this place has good food for a very inexpensive price. My wife and I have eaten here several times and we can walk out with a good dinner underneath our belts, well at least my belt for just a little over $20.00 with taxes. This place is not a real high end restaurant more of a local family run place that more and more locals seem to enjoy.
